page.title: 03 LEISURE FACILITIES:S-ON-A
page.content: THE MAIN VENUE OF ENTERTAINMENT IS THE RACECOURSE.LAST YEAR THERE WERE 13 RACE MEETINGS,3 TAKING PLACE IN THE EVENING; ALL WELL ATTENDED,HIGHLIGHTING THE LACK OF PARKING SPACE.THERE IS A RESTAURANT HIGHLY REPUTED FOR GOOD FOOD,AND A SMALL HALL RENTED PRIVATELY FOR VARIOUS SOCIAL FUNCTIONS.THERE ARE 3 HALLS,THE MOST ACTIVE BEING SHOTTERY MEMORIAL HALL AND YOUTH CENTRE,PROVIDING SPACIOUS HALLS FOR,EG.BINGO,DANCING,DOG TRAINING,CUBS,BROWNIES,WEDDINGS,PRIVATE PARTIES AND WEIGHT-WATCHERS.LUDDINGTON VILLAGE HALL IS SMALLER,SERVING NEARBY COMMUNITIES FOR PARTIES AND FETES.THERE ARE 6 PUBS OF VARYING CHARACTER.SOME HAVE FACILITIES,EG.GAMES ROOMS AND LOCAL FOOD SPECIALITIES WHICH ARE MAINLY FREQUENTED BY LOCALS.THE Â£BELL INN'AND OTHERS HAVE PICTURESQUE SURROUNDINGS FOR THE TOURISTS' ENJOYMENT.
